gameDetails.name: Chez Geek 3: Block Party
gameDetails.description:
Chez Geek 3: Block Party adds 56 new job, thing and activity cards to your Chez Geek game.  Now you can be a security guard (gets to sleep a lot), bicycle courier (likes the weed), "enevelope stuffer" (works at home and watches lots of tv), or the Lord of the Fries working the grill at Friedey's (gets free food, and a tip of the hat to Cheapass Games).

Expands:

    Chez Geek
    Chez Geek 2: Slack Attack


New Edition

    The cards from Chez Geek 3: Block Party are now incorperated in Chez Geek: House Party edition with the cards from Chez Geek 2: Slack Attack.
